dict.string: Derfner
I don't understand. You love it when I do that-- Wait, no. That's Stephen.
Derfner
Frantically hiding Porno and Mapplethorpe prints-- Mom is on her way.
Derfner
Remember when I Said I disliked oral sex? I meant just with you.
Derfner
You were perfection. Then you misspelled 'embarrassed.' Don't call me again.
Derfner
The salmon's divine, But I'm afraid we can't stay-- I fucked our waiter.
Derfner
It's our second date, And I'm not sure I love you. It's time to break up.
Derfner
Derfner
He's gorgeous, witty, And stimulating. Please, God, Let him be a top.
Derfner
You fill me with joy Ineffable, unending. What's your name again?
Derfner
I had a good time-- Hope I'll see you again soon. (Here, 'soon' means 'never.')
Derfner
Gay marriage gives us The most vital right of all: Registry at Saks.
Derfner
'Hope you understand.' Yes, of course I understand. And I hope you die.
Derfner
Dilemma at Pride: March with the Schubert Lovers Or the Leather Bears?
Derfner
Why is it you fuck As hard and fast as you can? I'm not PlayStation.
Derfner
See the eight-year-old Knitting mittens on the bus. Does his mother know?
Derfner
Forty-seven times You said, 'Give me that pussy. I have no pussy.
Derfner
The romance is gone, But we're staying together For the apartment.
Derfner
Yes, I'm a redhead All over, top to bottom. Shame you'll never know.
Derfner
Yes, this feels quite good. Still, could you pick up the pace? Golden Girls is on.
Derfner
'Give it to me good-- Oh, yeah, yeah, do it, daddy.' How embarrassing.
Derfner
See the gay man in His natural habitat: Bed, Bath, & Beyond.
Derfner
Group sex would be great If it weren't for this sad truth: People have elbows.
Derfner
Oh, Republicans, You know just where you can put Your family values.
Derfner
If you plan a tryst, Do not wear deodorant. It tastes really gross.
Derfner
Did you just say you Think Mansfield Park is boring? Get out of my house.
Derfner
It's nice to meet you. Matt said you were a great guy. So: one dog or two?
Derfner
Pride: shirtless homos As far as the eye can see. My pectorals suck.
Derfner
Going mad in Prague: Are all these hot guys gay, or Just European?
Derfner
'You're a musician?' 'I play skin-flute,' you answer. Whoops. There's my cell phone.
Derfner
'Let's have a drink first.' Excuse me? I didn't join Men4talk.com.
Derfner
At gay synagogue, Men's heads are bowed deep in prayer. Why aren't you cruising?
Derfner
The guys screwing on My TV screen are so butch. Then they start to speak.
Derfner
'Here's Death in Venice-- You like murder mysteries.' Should have dumped you then.
Derfner
Enthralled by the old Man and the stories he tells: Gay before Stonewall.
Derfner
I'm astonishing, But you still can't get it up. God, I hate Prozac.
Derfner
How is it you knew I wasn't faithful? Oh, yeah: Bite marks on my ass.
Derfner
You called me 'boyfriend' And I never phoned again. . . . Thing is, you weren't wrong.
Derfner
English has no words For what we just did in bed. Oh, wait: 'Tedious.'
Derfner
Oh, now I get it: You learned your foreplay technique From Powertool 2.
Derfner
You're smart and handsome And rich. Unfortunately, You live in Jersey.
Derfner
You think Kierkegaard Is a new deodorant-- Why does God hate me?
Derfner
'I don't understand Why you want to be with me.' 'That's okay. I do.'
Derfner
'I need time away, To figure out who I am.' I can tell you that.
Derfner
Teens now: out, proud, and Ignorant of Auntie Mame. Pyrrhic victory?
Derfner
You have talked and talked For hours on end. Yet still, My watch says 8:10.
Derfner
Headline: 'Alien Loose in New York.' That's not news-- I am dating him.
Derfner
I'm considering Giving up casual sex: I hate the subway.
Derfner
Mother's dilemma: Her son is gay, but dating A Jewish doctor.
Derfner
'This has been fun, but. . . .' I've got news for you, honey: It wasn't that fun.
Derfner
He's insightful, but-- Could we find a therapist You haven't slept with?
Derfner
'Oh, you're on South Beach? I eat all things and stay thin.' Get out of my sight.
Derfner
I feel so unloved That I want to kill myself. It must be Thursday.
Derfner
Where are all these gays Going this early? Oh, right: Sale at Ikea.
Derfner
We all make mistakes. For instance, I mistook you For a vertebrate.
Derfner
Summer, Cherry Grove: I gaze, wistful, towards the Pines, Wishing I were chic.
Derfner
Your lips are so soft, Your conversation graceful. It's just--you're not him.
Derfner
When he leaves the room, If I don't burst into tears, Then is it still love?
Derfner
Queer as Folk is trash, Badly written and acted. I watch every week.
Derfner
Break from the orgy. We stand nude in the kitchen And discuss Buffy.
Derfner
Man on the subway Exclaims, 'Christ paid your sin bill!' Christ must be loaded.
Derfner
You teach aerobics, Have a physics Ph.D., And think my name's Josh.
Derfner
'I'll call you Wednesday.' The phone didn't ring. Maybe He meant next Wednesday?
Derfner
Met a cute ex-gay Last night. As I suspected, He was cuter nude.
Derfner
Derfner
Yoga calms my mind. Then, unfortunately, I See the teacher's abs.
Derfner
My heart is broken. Maybe he will change his mind If I lose five pounds.
Derfner
Your CD rack has No Barbra, Britney, or Cher. Are you sure you're gay?
Derfner
Rule: kiss toad, get prince. It's been three weeks. So you can Change anytime now.
Derfner
I swear I will not Rest until justice is done: Vindicate Martha!
Derfner
I'm not judgmental. It's just that I have standards You will never meet.
Derfner
Minister Fred Phelps: Depraved homophobe with a Really bad hairdo.
Derfner
'The spark is just gone.' I can fix that easy, with Some gas and a match.
Derfner
Painting the hall--I Want blue; you insist on mauve. Will we make it through?
Derfner
You have updated Your online dating profile-- At least now I know.
Derfner
First date; you are a Log Cabin Republican. Someone shoot me now.
Derfner
Lovers at the gym: Matching A&F tank tops Make me want to hurl.
Derfner
You're cruel and petty And you like to make me cry. When can you move in?
Derfner
'He has a boyfriend.' 'No,' you say, 'they've broken up.' Paralyzed with hope.
Derfner
Dinner at your mom's-- I smile and pretend not To notice the dust.
Derfner
Yes, I forgive you. I understand you're human. Though, on second thought. . . .
Derfner
Walking through Chelsea Wearing last year's Versace: I'm a pariah.
Derfner
'I'm very flattered, But, to be honest with you. . . .' Why can't you just lie?
Derfner
I am giving you The best shot possible. So: What's with the poking?
Derfner
You fill my heart when I see you. The question is . . . Is it full enough?
Derfner
It's Dorian Grey In reverse: you aged, and yet Your photo stayed young.
Derfner
You are judgmental, Withholding, and cold. Jesus-- I'm dating my mom.
Derfner
'I have a boyfriend.' We've been talking three hours. You are a bastard.
Derfner
My therapist and All my friends say, 'Stay with him!' They can't hear you snore.
Derfner
Your room is filled with Leather and Star Wars figures. Um, I have to go.
Derfner
Art, music, theater, Apricot-mango face scrub-- What haven't gays done?
Derfner
'I'm coming!' you shout, As if no one had ever Managed it before.
Derfner
'Yeah, suck it, big boy.' This is fun, I guess. But I Could be reading Proust.
Derfner
We've just met--I think We might be going too fast. So I won't swallow.
Derfner
How can we fix us? The fights, the silence. . . . I know! Let's get a puppy!
Derfner
As I leave, my clothes Back on, I realize what's wrong: Have you got some gel?
Derfner
You are not the man I always dreamed I would love-- And yet here we are.
Derfner
That's not ten inches-- Unless you happen to be Counting in base five.
Derfner
I'm on a new diet: Atkins for the Soul. Sorry, But you're full of carbs.
Derfner
I'd say 'I love you'-- But I'm worried that I won't Mean it tomorrow.
Derfner
Ab Fab preempted By Queer Eye for the Straight Guy: My life, on TV.
Derfner
I am over you. So why, after I see you, Are my cheeks so wet?
Derfner
Alone at the bar, My soul filled with deep longing And deeper terror.
Derfner
This orgy is lame. But I am, alas, in no Position to leave.
Derfner
Summer in P-Town, Picking up guys left and right: Thank God for my dog.
Derfner
No more empty sex: It is interfering with My TV schedule.
Derfner
I'm turning thirty: Today, a birthday party. Tomorrow, the home.
Derfner
I know you think I Like it when you slap my ass. You are mistaken.
Derfner
Flailing to the beat-- Could I possibly look half As dumb as I feel?
Derfner
Last night, you looked hot. Today, you want to discuss The whole foods movement.
Derfner
'Hope springs eternal.' Don't people realize this is A terrible thing?
